casebody.data:
PEOPLE
v.
SALCIDO S256283 Supreme Court of California. AUGUST 21, 2019

Votes: Cantil-Sakauye, C.J., Chin, Corrigan, Liu, Cuéllar, Kruger and Groban, JJ.

The petition for review is granted. Further action in this matter is deferred pending finality in In re Ricardo P., S230923 and pending consideration and disposition of related issues in People v. Trujillo, S244650 (see Cal. Rules of Court, rule 8.512(d)(2) ), or pending further order of the court. Submission of additional briefing, pursuant to California Rules of Court, rule 8.520, is deferred pending further order of the court.
